about_the_game:
This is a collection of retro pixel art graphics of various insects, beetles, butterflies and much more. Have you ever thought of giving your player an insect catching net in your game?
With this pack you can create the perfect insect catching game for your game.

Not only icon size but also tile size is included so that they can be placed directly on the tiles!

Content:

● IconSet：1 sheets(100 bugs)
● Tilesets：1 sheets(96 bugs)


TOTAL of 100 pixel art unique icon sprites

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
This is a collection of retro pixel art graphics of various insects, beetles, butterflies and much more. Have you ever thought of giving your player an insect catching net in your game?
With this pack you can create the perfect insect catching game for your game.

Not only icon size but also tile size is included so that they can be placed directly on the tiles!

Content:

● IconSet：1 sheets(100 bugs)
● Tilesets：1 sheets(96 bugs)


TOTAL of 100 pixel art unique icon sprites

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
